description: Design inspirations for brand identity reports and web interfaces

inspirations.name: Sivoro - Startup Marketing Website

visual_style.layout: Dynamic asymmetric layouts with overlapping elements
visual_style.spacing: Generous whitespace with bold blocks of color

use_cases: Startup landing pages targeting tech-savvy audiences
SaaS products emphasizing innovation and speed
Product launches requiring high energy and impact
key_features: Bold CTA buttons with strong contrast
inspirations.when_to_use: Use this style when your brand wants to appear cutting-edge, innovative, and energetic. Best for B2B SaaS, fintech, or developer-focused products that need to stand out.
inspirations.when_not_to_use: Avoid for enterprise/corporate brands, healthcare, finance (traditional), or brands requiring conservative trust signals.

inspirations.name: Zentro - Workflow Platform Landing Page

visual_style.spacing: Comfortable spacing with clear section divisions

inspirations.when_to_use: Perfect for productivity tools, workflow platforms, and B2B software where clarity and efficiency are paramount. Appeals to enterprise buyers and decision-makers.
inspirations.when_not_to_use: Not ideal for consumer apps, lifestyle brands, or products targeting creative industries that expect more personality.

inspirations.name: Rizar - SaaS Website Design

visual_style.typography: Refined serif for headlines, clean sans for body
visual_style.layout: Structured with generous margins, centered compositions
visual_style.spacing: Luxurious spacing that breathes, premium feel

key_features: Serif typography for authority and trust
Clear value propositions with social proof
inspirations.when_to_use: Use for premium products where trust, authority, and sophistication matter. Excellent for financial services, legal tech, or enterprise software with high contract values.
inspirations.when_not_to_use: Avoid for fast-moving startups, casual consumer apps, or products targeting younger audiences who may find it too formal.

inspirations.name: Miawmiaw Studio - SaaS Enterprise Website

visual_style.layout: Fluid, organic shapes and flowing sections

key_features: Warm color palettes that feel human
inspirations.when_to_use: Perfect for products targeting designers, marketers, educators, or creative professionals. Works well when you want to differentiate from sterile enterprise software.
inspirations.when_not_to_use: Not suitable for finance, healthcare, legal, or industries requiring serious authority signals. May be too casual for Fortune 500 enterprise sales.

color.vibrant_tech: Bold purples, electric blues, bright gradients (Sivoro style)
color.professional_trust: Cool blues, soft purples, neutral grays (Zentro style)
color.premium_authority: Deep navy, gold accents, white (Rizar style)
color.friendly_creative: Warm pastels, soft purples, peachy tones (Miawmiaw style)

typography.modern_bold: Strong sans-serif, large headlines, high contrast
typography.clean_readable: Clean sans-serif, excellent hierarchy, medium weights
typography.elegant_premium: Serif for headlines, sans for body, refined
typography.friendly_approachable: Rounded sans-serif, gentle curves, warm feel

layout.centered_luxurious: Generous margins, breathing room, premium feel
layout.fluid_organic: Flowing shapes, soft edges, playful asymmetry

spacing.compact_energetic: Tighter spacing, more content density, fast pace

notes: These inspirations should inform both the brand extraction quality (what good design looks like) and the report design itself (how we present extracted brands).
